title: Reliability Verification in the Cloud Delivers Significant Runtime Benefits
description: Design complexities and time-to-market pressures compel companies to find innovative ways to leverage all available resources. Cloud compute environments provide a scalable and sustainable platform that can significantly improve runtimes in Calibre® PERC™ flows and other demanding EDA compute tasks. Running Calibre PERC verification flows on cloud resources to satisfy peak demand usage can increase productivity and expedite turnaround-times. Understanding the cost/benefit relationship of cloud computing helps companies determine the optimal configuration that provides the greatest returns.
